content:
I want to do more active outreach to different async communities. I'd like suggestions for groups of people to talk to, but I'm also unsure how best to contact some groups.

  • rocket (cc @Sergio Benitez)
  • bastion authors / users ( cc @vertexclique )
  • actix (cc @Rob Ede)

For async-std/tokio I was planning on writing something to their respective discords etc.

Also, what major projects or other communities am I embarassingly forgetting?
Context for those of you who I cc'd but have no idea what I'm talking about is the imminent launch of the 'async vision doc' process =) https://github.com/rust-lang/blog.rust-lang.org/pull/796
Perhaps the Knurling crowd for the embedded perspective?

Actix discord is the busiest hub for devs and users.
https://discord.gg/NWpN5mmg3x
@nikomatsakis : https://knurling.ferrous-systems.com/#features It's from ferrous systems. I believe they were the ones working on async/await no_std
I would certainly post also on the embedded matrix
I think the sqlx community is worth reaching out to.
